attributes.action: Ban the "reality" tv program the only way is Essex
attributes.additional_details: It is a ridiculous program and it is racist and sets a terrible stereotype for essex people and is a terrible example for children. Those from Essex who do not enjoy the show are harrased by those who think all Eseex people are like they are in the program. It's descrimination help get it banned.

rejection.details: It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters, either on arrangements for scheduling or on content. It is important to maintain the principle of freedom of expression which political interference could undermine.
